// Pivot 0, 0
int pinballdefinitivo[22] = {
	81, 536,
	74, 534,
	70, 540,
	70, 618,
	72, 626,
	127, 674,
	136, 664,
	85, 619,
	81, 605,
	82, 558,
	82, 543
};
